name: Nuts, it's cold outside!
description:
Use WASD or arrow keys to operate.

This game was made by Hollydragon_ using the Bitsy game engine by Adam LeDoux for the 30 day  Games Now! online jam #7

YOU ARE A SQUIRREL AND YOU NEED NUTS

Winter is coming, the leaves are falling, and you must gather a stash of food for winter so that you can hibernate peacefully in your drey (that's a squirrel nest btw). This is a perfectly normal and regular thing for a squirrel to do, and therefore nothing unusual could possibly happen to you... right?

Have questions? Like the art? You can join the Hollydragon Discord!
